outline:
1. all, whole, the whole
    1. the whole of, all
    2. every, any, none
kjv_def: all, any, + (forasmuch) as, + be-(for this) cause, every, + no (manner, -ne), + there (where) -fore, + though, what (where, who) -soever, (the) whole.
strongs_def: {properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)}
